title: ALLIANCE ENGINEERING CONSTRUCTION
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: alliance_engineering_construction
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.0M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with ALLIANCE ENGINEERING CONSTRUCTION. The average
  contract duration was 0.52 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.1M.
  The longest contract was 1.21 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $2.6M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.0M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '29%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '26%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2.5'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '458.4K'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.52'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '1.1M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '1.21'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '2.6M'
